data.name: HTD
data.description: [TIP' 21] HTD: Heterogeneous Task Decoupling for Two-stage Object Detection

evidence: "This work is based on the mmdetection framework. Please refer to get_started.md for installation. Please follow the official instruction of mmdetection and use our config files (configs/htd/...) to run the code." (indicates an object detection application run by users)

"HTD: Heterogeneous Task Decoupling for Two-Stage Object Detection" and the abstract describing a new object detection framework and modules used to obtain experimental results (indicates direct role in producing research findings)

The repository provides environment requirements and instructs users to run the code via configs in this GitHub repo, with no mention of package managers or binaries (implying distribution via the source repository).
